EmailTemplate.subject: At TJX, Browsing is Fun. But How Can You Make Checkout Simpler?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: We know it’s TJX’s goal to deliver an elevated customer experience with unbeatable deals for your customers. You’ve made browsing fun, but what about making checkout easier? With a data-driven checkout area design, you all at TJX can boost sales, free up labor, and satisfy your shoppers. Let’s partner to discover the most successful checkout layout for your stores – leveraging your very own data. Interested in learning more about delivering a differentiated checkout experience?
